com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.msg

Class FileBackedResponseContentImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.msg.FileBackedResponseContentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamingResponseContent

    public class FileBackedResponseContentImpl
extends Object
implements StreamingResponseContent
    StreamingResponseContent implementation used for returning content for entries that have external File-backed payload. Difference to SimpleStreamingResponseContent is that due to file system access, more care has to be taken, including allowing possible throttling of reading of content to output.

    • Field Summary

      • getLength

        public long getLength()
        Description copied from interface: StreamingResponseContent
        Method that may be called to check length of the content to stream, if known. If length is not known, -1 will be returned; otherwise non-negative length.
        Specified by:
